# Tank Track — Septic Business Software

> Cloud-based software built exclusively for septic companies with 1-10 trucks. Founded 2013. Family-owned.

## What Tank Track Does

Tank Track is the only software platform built exclusively for the septic industry. It handles scheduling, invoicing, route optimization, customer management, compliance reporting, and — uniquely — automatic Texas Trip Ticket generation.

Key differentiators:
- **Texas Trip Tickets**: The only septic software that auto-generates TCEQ-compliant Trip Tickets for every job. No other competitor offers this.
- **Per-truck pricing**: $99/month (1 truck) to $329/month (7-10 trucks). No per-user fees.
- **No contracts**: Month-to-month. 60-day money-back guarantee.
- **Septic-only**: Not a general field service tool. Built exclusively for the septic industry.
- **Fast onboarding**: Most companies go live in 3 business days.

## Pricing

| Plan | Trucks | Price/Month |
|------|--------|-------------|
| Starter | 1 | $99 |
| Growth | 2-3 | $179 |
| Pro | 4-6 | $249 |
| Fleet | 7-10 | $329 |

All plans include every feature. No add-on fees.

## Key Features

- Scheduling & dispatch (drag-and-drop board, SMS reminders)
- Invoicing & payment processing (card, ACH, QuickBooks sync)
- Texas Trip Ticket automation (auto-fill, digital signature, 3-year storage)
- Route optimization (up to 30% fuel savings)
- Customer management (service history, tank records, notes)
- Compliance reporting (OSSF, DEP, state-specific)
- Mobile app (iOS and Android)

## Company

- Founded: 2013
- Type: Family-owned SaaS
- Focus: Septic businesses exclusively (not portable toilet, not dumpster)
- Customer count: 500+ septic companies
- Rating: 5.0/5.0 (47 reviews)
- Guarantee: 60-day money-back, no contracts

## Target Customer

Small to mid-size septic pumping companies with 1-10 trucks in the United States. Especially strong fit for Texas operators due to Trip Ticket automation.
